enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting or initializing a value in the SingletonMap.
Both methods involve setting or initializing a value in the SingletonMap using a KeyValue object.
Both methods involve setting or initializing a value in the SingletonMap using a Map.Entry object.
The put method relies on the setValue method to update the value if the key matches.
The putAll method may invoke the setValue method indirectly through the put method if the map size is 1.
